definition[0]: to give all your attention and effort to one particular thing
example[0]: The actress now dedicates herself to children’s charity work.
definition[1]: to say at the beginning of a book or film, or before a piece of music, that it has been written, made, or performed for someone that you love or respect
example[1]: The book was dedicated to her husband.
definition[2]: to state in an official ceremony that a building will be given someone’s name in order to show respect for them
definition[3]: to use a place, time, money etc only for a particular purpose
example[2]: The company dedicated $50,000 for the study.
